basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilus, Bacillus cereus, Bacillus circulans, Bacillus megaterium, Corynebacterium glutamicum, Corynebacterium bovis, Mycobacterium phlei, Nocardia corrallina, Micrococcus luteus, Micrococcus lysodeikticus, Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus faecalis, Streptococcus faecium;Gram-negative bacteria:Enterobacter cloacae, Escherichia coli, Klebsiella pneumoniae, Proteus inconstans, Salmonella typhimurium, Shigella sonnei, Pseudomonas fluorescens, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Pseudomonas reptilivora.
